oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jane Tucker Maxwell oral history
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tucker, Jane Maxwell
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Jane Maxwell Tucker witnessed the impact of World War II on campus life during her years as a student at Middle Tennessee State Teachers College.
1. Campus life without men -- 2. College Training Detachment and campus life -- 3. Student interaction with College Training Detachment.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War II; Eleventh College Training Detachment
Women college students; Dormitories; College sports; United States. Army Air Forces. College Training Detachment, 11th; World War, 1939-1945; Middle Tennessee State Teachers College
